Goodwater Genesis

Building the world’s best consumer-tech seed-stage ecosystem.

Genesis is our seed program that democratizes access to seed funding and entrepreneurial guidance. falsefalse

We provide entrepreneurs around the world with unprecedented access to community, resources, consumer tech insights, and capital.

Apply to Goodwater Genesis

Program Overview

Our portfolio isn’t a pipeline, seeking to extract value as companies pass through.

Instead, we view it as a cycle, built to provide ongoing support that nourishes sustainable, mutually-beneficial growth over the lifecycle of the business.

The Genesis Process

01

Fast Decisions

We kick off Genesis relationships with rapid seed investments designed to help promising companies build momentum.

02

Long Term Partners

We kick off Genesis relationships with rapid seed investments designed to help promising companies build momentum.

03

Growth-Fueling Portfolio Services

We kick off Genesis relationships with rapid seed investments designed to help promising companies build momentum.

How We Work

Accelerate growth with data-driven continuous improvement.

Our approach to serving startups is rooted in data-driven continuous improvement. We start by guiding founders to track and report the right foundational metrics. Then, we provide benchmarking paired with content and community services that help companies accelerate their growth. The cycle repeats itself, propelling companies toward greater levels of success with each iteration.

01

Seek out promising consumer tech companies

We don’t hear thousands of pitches per year. We find and invest in just a handful of great companies.

02

Make $5M to $50M investments

We support companies from Series A to IPO.

03

Provide software, data, services, and support

We provide entrepreneurs with detailed data, concierge services, start-up curriculum, and strategic advice.

04

Make capital investments

We specialize 100% in consumer tech. And nothing else.

That singular focus means we know more about your business, your competition, and the pathways to success than any other investor.

05

Reinvest wisdom and resources

We don’t hear thousands of pitches per year. We find and invest in just a handful of great companies.

Be a part of a growing community of entrepreneurs.

As a company matures, we help founders prepare for Series A and are able to lead investment rounds, propelling the business toward scale and success. Want to be part of it?
